entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who fell asleep in Divination class.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a professor at Hogwarts who shows understanding and patience towards Harry.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story who is torturing Wormtail in Harry's dream.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a character who is being tortured by Voldemort in Harry's dream.

relationships.description: Harry has a conversation with Dumbledore about his dream.
Voldemort is torturing Wormtail in Harry's dream.
Harry has a dream about Wormtail being tortured by Voldemort.
